// src/components/StoryList.js
import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import myImage from'../images/Page-1.png';import axios from'axios';import'./StoryList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function StoryList(){const[stories,setStories]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{async function fetchStories(){try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/adventure');setStories(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching stories:',error);}}fetchStories();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"story-list",children:stories.map(story=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"story-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`${myImage}`,alt:story.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:story.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:story.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/story/${story._id}`,children:"Read More"})]},story._id))});}export default StoryList;
